nodes.bodyText: In addition, scripts/version.js should be updated to make it actually updated by script.

Got TS compile erros when trying out the PR.
ERROR in [at-loader] ./node_modules/@vaadin/flow-frontend/DeferrableEndpoint.ts:1:7 
    TS2451: Cannot redeclare block-scoped variable '$wnd'.

ERROR in [at-loader] ./target/flow-frontend/DeferrableEndpoint.ts:1:7 
    TS2451: Cannot redeclare block-scoped variable '$wnd'.
Good catch, I had somehow dropped the empty export from the commit and it was working randomly when testing it. Now fixed.
